Reference

All functions

create_module()

create module with biological features and sample sets

get_biofeature_by_ann_term()

get all the biofeatures (genes here) which include the selected term within the annotations values

get_biofeature_by_name()

get biofeature sequence by name

get_biofeature_id()

get_biofeature_id

get_biofeature_info()

get_biofeature_info

get_compendia()

Get all available compendia

get_compendium_data_source()

Get compendium data sources

get_experiments()

Get experiment Accessids and name use get_compendia to check all the available compendia

get_ontologies()

Get all ontologies for

get_platform_types()

get available platform types

get_platforms()

Get all available platforms for the selected compendium, use get_compendia to check all the available compendia

get_sample_annotation()

get annotations for n samples from the selected compendium

get_sample_by_ann_term()

get samples related to a specific annotation term

get_sample_info()

get_sample_info

get_samples()

Get all samples measuread with a given Platform

get_sampleset_id_by_name()

get_sampleset_id_by_name

merge_modules()

Union of two modules

rcompass-package

COMPASS (COMpendia Programmatic Access Support Software) API client library
